css-flexbox_key3: CSS3 ke bare mei padho aur samjho ki CSS, CSS3 se kaise different hain. Yeh difference apne facilitator ko slack par batao. Isse padhne ke baad, apko CSS Classes ke bare mein padna hai.  Aap iske baare mein
css-flexbox_key5: se padhe. Ab fir se aapko padhne ke baad jo samajh aaya usse slack par apne facilitator ko bhejo.

css-flexbox_key12: ko flex ka use kar kar karo. Yeh flex se karne ke liye yeh dekho ki iss page mei teen main flex container ki jaroorat padegi:
